title: Living Joyously (Part 1 of 2)
itunes:author: Guest: David Ring
itunes:summary:
“I have cerebral palsy-what's your problem?” Whatever difficulties you face, you can't help but be encouraged as you hear David Ring describe how God's strength helps him overcome the limitations of his severe disability. (Part 1 of 2)


Receive the book "The Boy Born Dead" and the audio download of the broadcast "Living Joyously" for your donation of any amount! Plus, receive member-exclusive benefits when you make a recurring gift today. Your monthly support helps families thrive: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-10-19?refcd=1499305


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/living-joyously-part-1-of-2/#featured-resource-cta


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
